Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.7 Pañhāvāra » 21.7.3 Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
Ajjhattattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomapaccanīya
Hetuduka
55.
2866Hetupaccayā naārammaṇe dve, naadhipatiyā naanantare nasamanantare naaññamaññe naupanissaye dve (saṃkhittaṃ, sabbattha dve), nasampayutte navippayutte nonatthiyā novigate dve. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
2867Anulomapaccanīyaṃ.
